articles.content:
ByteDance filed for a TikTok Music trademark in May
Illustration by Alex Castro / The Verge
Considering how intertwined music discovery is with TikTok, it wouldnt be all that surprising if the comp… [+1971 chars]

articles.title: The $1,199 M2 MacBook Air cuts too many corners - Macworld
articles.description: Overall testing suggests the cheapest version of Apple's new Air is a long way behind its more expensive sibling, although we were surprised by impressive scores in a few areas.
